Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Cancer Immunology Working Group Working Group. The 2022 CIMM Town Hall will feature three presentations on the most current and controversial topics in the cancer immunology community on the theme of the Tumour Immune Microenvironment and Response to Therapy. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
Location: Grand Ballroom C, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
